::Feline::

She had fallen asleep with her head propted on her hand, and leaning 
against the counter.  She jerked awake as HotRod called out.  She 
yawned and stretched. "I'm here. What's up?" She smiled at him. She 
got up and walked to him. SHe smirked, "What did you call me?"  She 
knew what he had said, and what he might say, but she wanted to heat 
it. Just once, she wanted to hear it. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He couldn't stay asleep. He walked to his desk, and sat. He 
activated a
> holo projector. There was a holo picture of Optimus Prime, Ultra 
Magnus,
> Springer, ArrCee, Gold Bug, Kup, and other Autobots, Aerialbots, 
and the
> Dinobots, as well as himself. Tears of oil, and other mech fluids
> appeared in his eyes, and ran down his cheek. It had been a long 
time
> since he had looked at this, and saw his old friends. Many were
> perminetly offline, or retired. These were the bots and friends 
that he
> searved with, for millions of years. He clicked a switch, and a 
large
> pic of Optimus Prime appeared. Hot Rod put his head in his hands, 
and
> looked at the pic. He began talking in a wisper, to his former 
mentor,
> teacher, and dearest friend.
> "Hello, Optimus. It's been a long time." He went on for two hours,
> before going to the CR room for a recharge. He looked for Feline.
> "Hello? Honey?"
